complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Setup Project Infrastructure' task into 7 detailed subtasks, each with clear acceptance criteria, estimated effort, and technical considerations for setting up Next.js 14, Supabase, Clerk, and the development environment.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple technologies (Next.js, Supabase, Clerk) and requires configuration of various development tools and CI/CD pipelines. The 7 points in the details section align with natural subtask boundaries.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the 'Implement Authentication with Clerk' task into 7 subtasks covering sign-up/login flows, magic link authentication, Google SSO, protected routes, middleware, session management, and frontend hooks.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Authentication implementation has moderate complexity with multiple flows (standard, magic link, SSO) and requires both frontend and backend work. The 7 points in the details section represent logical components of the authentication system.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand the 'Create Organization and Role Management' task into 7 subtasks covering Clerk Organizations configuration, role schema definition, UI components, RBAC implementation, API endpoints, organization switching, and Supabase RLS setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task has high complexity due to the need to implement role-based access control across multiple systems (Clerk and Supabase) and create a complete organization management system with proper security boundaries.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Design and Implement Database Schema' task into 7 subtasks covering table design, RLS policies, indexing, relationships, database functions/triggers, soft delete functionality, and migration system setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Database schema design requires deep technical knowledge and careful planning to ensure data integrity, security, and performance. The schema must support complex relationships between leases, documents, and organizations while maintaining proper access controls.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the 'Implement Lease Portfolio CRUD Operations' task into 7 subtasks covering Supabase client functions, API routes, UI components for listing/details/editing, form validation, archiving functionality, optimistic UI updates, and pagination/sorting.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves creating a complete CRUD system with both frontend and backend components. It requires form validation, optimistic updates, and performance considerations for handling large datasets.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand the 'Implement Document Upload System' task into 7 subtasks covering Supabase Storage configuration, signed URL generation, drag-and-drop UI, validation, progress indicators, file organization, and metadata storage.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Document upload functionality has moderate complexity with requirements for secure uploads, progress tracking, and proper organization of files. The system must handle large files (up to 50MB) and maintain proper metadata.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop OpenAI Vision Integration for Document Extraction
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Develop OpenAI Vision Integration for Document Extraction' task into 8 subtasks covering Edge Function creation, prompt engineering, response parsing, data mapping, error handling, rate limiting, extraction queue, and accuracy monitoring.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task has high complexity due to AI integration, complex data extraction, and the need for high accuracy (95%). It requires sophisticated prompt engineering, error handling, and performance optimization to process documents within 8 seconds.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the 'Implement Real-time Progress and Notifications' task into 7 subtasks covering Supabase Realtime configuration, client-side subscriptions, progress bar components, notification system, toast notifications, preference settings, and background processes.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Real-time functionality adds complexity due to the need for websocket connections, state synchronization across clients, and reliable delivery of notifications. The system must handle various notification types and user preferences.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand the 'Develop Activity Feed System' task into 7 subtasks covering activity log table design, trigger implementation, API endpoints, UI components, real-time updates, filtering/pagination, and detail views.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The activity feed requires database triggers, real-time updates, and UI components for displaying a chronological feed of events. It has moderate complexity with requirements for filtering, pagination, and organization scoping.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Email Notification System' task into 7 subtasks covering email service integration, template creation, scheduled functions, preference settings, delivery tracking, retry logic, and testing mode.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Email notification systems have moderate complexity with requirements for reliable delivery, scheduling, and user preferences. The system must handle various notification types and ensure proper delivery timing for lease expiry alerts.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the 'Develop ASC 842 & IFRS 16 Reporting System' task into 8 subtasks covering calculation logic, PDF generation, Excel generation, report templates, customization options, caching, background processing, and compliance validation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Financial reporting has high complexity due to regulatory requirements (ASC 842/IFRS 16) and performance constraints (10 seconds for 100 leases). It requires sophisticated calculation logic, document generation, and optimization techniques.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand the 'Implement Report Template Management' task into 7 subtasks covering database schema design, template management UI, template application, recent reports tracking, sharing functionality, favoriting, and search/filtering.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Template management has moderate complexity with requirements for saving, loading, and sharing report configurations. The system must track recent reports and provide search/filtering capabilities.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Search and Filter Functionality' task into 7 subtasks covering Supabase full-text search configuration, API endpoints, search UI, filter controls, date range filtering, saved searches, and performance optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Search functionality has moderate-to-high complexity due to full-text search requirements, multiple filter types, and performance considerations for large datasets. The system must provide accurate results with proper organization scoping.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the 'Integrate Stripe for Billing' task into 7 subtasks covering Stripe account setup, pricing tier configuration, Checkout modal implementation, webhook handlers, subscription management UI, usage tracking, and billing history.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Payment integration has high complexity due to the need for secure handling of financial transactions, webhook processing, and subscription management. The system must track usage limits and provide proper billing information.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand the 'Implement User Profile and Settings' task into 7 subtasks covering user profile UI, organization settings, payment method management, usage dashboard, plan comparison, user preferences, and theme settings.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: User profile and settings functionality has moderate complexity with requirements for personal and organization-level settings. The system must handle payment methods, usage tracking, and user preferences.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Create Audit Trail System' task into 7 subtasks covering audit log schema design, trigger implementation, audit trail UI, filtering/search, report generation, extraction history views, and data export.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Audit trail implementation has high complexity due to requirements for immutability, comprehensive data capture, and compliance verification. The system must track all changes to sensitive data and provide proper reporting capabilities.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the 'Implement Performance Monitoring and Optimization' task into 7 subtasks covering server-side monitoring, client-side tracking, performance dashboards, query optimization, caching implementation, alerting setup, and testing suite creation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Performance optimization requires specialized knowledge and tools to meet strict latency requirements (p95 â‰¤150ms). The system must monitor both server and client performance and provide alerts for degradation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand the 'Implement Security Measures' task into 7 subtasks covering data encryption, TLS implementation, IAM policies, security headers, CSRF protection, security scanning, and SOC 2 documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Security implementation has high complexity due to SOC 2 compliance requirements and the need for comprehensive protection of sensitive financial data. The system must implement multiple layers of security controls.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Analytics and KPI Tracking' task into 7 subtasks covering user action tracking, time-to-first-value measurement, MAO tracking, accuracy monitoring, success rate tracking, conversion tracking, and analytics dashboard.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Analytics implementation has moderate complexity with requirements for tracking various KPIs across different parts of the application. The system must collect and analyze data while respecting privacy requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the 'Implement Accessibility Compliance' task into 7 subtasks covering accessibility audit, semantic HTML implementation, color contrast verification, keyboard navigation, ARIA attributes, screen reader testing, and documentation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Accessibility implementation has moderate-to-high complexity due to WCAG 2.1 AA compliance requirements across all UI components. The system must support keyboard navigation, screen readers, and proper semantic markup.
